info.name: teamfortress.tv - Dark
info.additionalInfo:
Tested on Firefox and Chrom(ium). Uses css variables, requiring a recent browser version. http://caniuse.com/#feat=css-variables The flags are from lipis/flag-icon-css and can be found here. To install the flags in Firefox:
  • Create a new blank style
  • Paste all the text
To install the flags in Chrom(ium):
  • Create a new style
  • Click Import under Mozilla Format
  • Paste all the text
  • Click Overwrite Style
Make sure to give the style a name and click Save in both cases. I also use this userscript to embed links to images as an image.

data.title: Thank you so much for this!
